mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( board_no, town_no, member_no, board_title, board_content, board_write_date, board_enabled ) SELECT BOARD_SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{townNo}, m.member_no, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, 1 FROM member m WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.member_No = m.member_No WHERE b.town_no = #{townNo} AND b.board_title LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%' ORDER BY b.board_No DESC OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_write_date, t.town_dong, COALESCE(c.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM BOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY board_no ) c ON b.board_no = c.board_no LEFT JOIN town t ON b.town_no = t.town_no -- town 테이블 조인 WHERE b.town_no != 0 OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
